Package model

Class ModelManager

java.lang.Object
model.ModelManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, Model, NamedPropertyChangeSubject
public class ModelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
A class used to manage a set of objects, which are the resources of the client.
Version:
1.0.0 2021
Author:
Group8-SEP2

    • applyFilters

      public java.util.ArrayList<Offer> applyFilters​(double minPrice, double maxPrice, int noOfRooms, java.lang.String type, int floor, double deposit)
      Method invoked remotely from the server side to obtain the list of the Offer objects for filter search
      Specified by:
      applyFilters in interface Model
      Parameters:
      minPrice - The minimum price for filter search.
      maxPrice - The maximum price for filter search.
      noOfRooms - The number of rooms in a Offer for filter search.
      type - The type of Offer for filter search.
      floor - The floor from Offer for filter search.
      deposit - The deposit from Offer for filter search.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList with filtered offers stored in the database.

      Parameters:
      propertyName - String containing the name of the property the listener will listen to.

      Specified by:
      removeListener in interface NamedPropertyChangeSubject
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String containing the name of the property the listener will stop to listen to.
